metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Add potatoes and cauliflower, stir to coat with spices . Cover and cook until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally . Add salt to taste and serve . Heat olive oil in a pan and brown meatballs on all sides .

1 small onion o 1 cucumber o 1/4 cup cilantro, lemon juice, and salt . Serve chilled . o 2 cups flour o 1/2 cup milk o 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 cup grated cheese . Sauté sliced onion in butter until golden .

o 1/4 cup olive oil o Rosemary o Sea salt o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy . Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled . Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20-25 minutes until golden .

Soak black-eyed peas overnight, then peel and rinse . Blend mixture with diced onion, minced garlic, and salt until smooth . Drain on paper towels and serve warm .  o 1 block tofu o 1/4 cup cornstarch o 1/2 cup dashi broth o 2 tablespoons soy sauce .

Heat oil in a pan. o Pipe dough into hot oil and fry until golden . Drain on paper towels and roll in mixture of sugar and cinnamon . Sauté shredded coconut until lightly browned. Add rice, coconut milk, water, and salt .
